mapper.insert:
insert into unicom_alarm_library_lte
alarm_name,
alarm_meaning,
alarm_level_id,
alarm_type,
alarm_scope,
recommend,
#{alarmName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{alarmMeaning,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{alarmLevelId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{alarmType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{alarmScope,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{recommend,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update unicom_alarm_library_lte
alarm_meaning = #{alarmMeaning,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
alarm_level_id = #{alarmLevelId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
alarm_type = #{alarmType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
alarm_scope = #{alarmScope,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
recommend = #{recommend,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
where alarm_name = #{alarmName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update unicom_alarm_library_lte set alarm_meaning = #{alarmMeaning,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, alarm_level_id = #{alarmLevelId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, alarm_type = #{alarmType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, alarm_scope = #{alarmScope,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, recommend = #{recommend,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where alarm_name = #{alarmName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: SELECT alarm_name alarmName, alarm_meaning alarmMeaning, alarm_level_id alarmLevelId, alarm_type alarmType, alarm_scope alarmScope, recommend FROM unicom_alarm_library_lte ORDER BY alarm_name ASC

SELECT alarm_name alarmName, alarm_meaning alarmMeaning, alarm_level_id alarmLevelId, alarm_type alarmType, alarm_scope alarmScope, recommend FROM unicom_alarm_library_lte WHERE alarm_name = #{alarmName}
mapper.update:
UPDATE unicom_alarm_library_lte
alarm_name = #{param.alarmName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
alarm_meaning = #{param.alarmMeaning,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
alarm_level_id = #{param.alarmLevelId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
alarm_type = #{param.alarmType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
alarm_scope = #{param.alarmScope,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
recommend = #{param.recommend,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WHERE alarm_name = #{alarmName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: INSERT IGNORE INTO unicom_alarm_library_lte ( alarm_name, alarm_meaning, alarm_level_id, alarm_type, alarm_scope, recommend) VALUES ( #{param.alarmName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{param.alarmMeaning, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{param.alarmLevelId, jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{param.alarmType, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{param.alarmScope, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{param.recommend, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: SELECT a.alarm_name_id alarmNameId, b.alarm_level_id alarmLevelId, b.alarm_name alarmName, b.alarm_meaning alarmMeaning, b.alarm_type alarmType, b.alarm_scope alarmScope, b.recommend FROM unicom_alarm_index a RIGHT JOIN unicom_alarm_library_lte b ON a.alarm_name=b.alarm_name
mapper.insert:
INSERT IGNORE INTO unicom_alarm_library_lte ( alarm_name, alarm_meaning, alarm_level_id, alarm_type, alarm_scope, recommend) VALUES
( #{item.alarmName}, #{item.alarmMeaning}, #{item.alarmLevelId}, #{item.alarmType}, #{item.alarmScope}, #{item.recommend} )
